titles.title: Worthy Is The Lamb That Was Slain For You And Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain for you and me,
Worship Him at His footstool, holy is He, holy is He.
Behold the Lamb standing on Mt. Zion and His bride,
With His name on their foreheads,
And they cried with a mighty voice, Revere God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who bow before Him and sing,
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain for you and me,
Worship Him at His footstool, holy is He, holy is He.
Who shall not fear thee, O Lord
But laud and glorify, for Thou alone art holy (thy name)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And all nations come and worship Thee, for Thy judgments
Are made manifest, they bow before Him and sing,
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain for you and me,
Worship Him at His footstool, holy is He, holy is He.
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain for you and me,
Worship Him at His footstool, holy is He, holy is He.
